00193 /* Internally used for mapping socket functions on IOCTLs */
00194 struct _rtdm_getsockopt_args {
00195         int level;
00196         int optname;
00197         void *optval;

00253 /* Define RTDM_NO_DEFAULT_USER_API to switch off the default rt_dev_xxx
00254  * interface when providing a customised user API */
00255 #ifndef RTDM_NO_DEFAULT_USER_API
00256 
00257 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00258 
00259 #define rt_dev_open(path, oflag, ...)                           \
00260         __rt_dev_open(NULL, path, oflag)
00261 
00262 #define rt_dev_socket(protocol_family, socket_type, protocol)   \
00263         __rt_dev_socket(NULL, protocol_family, socket_type, protocol)
00264 
00265 #define rt_dev_close(fd)                                        \
00266         __rt_dev_close(NULL, fd)
00267 
00268 #define rt_dev_ioctl(fd, request, ...)                          \
00269         __rt_dev_ioctl(NULL, fd, request, __VA_ARGS__)
00270 
00271 #define rt_dev_read(fd, buf, nbyte)                             \
00272         __rt_dev_read(NULL, fd, buf, nbyte)
00273 
00274 #define rt_dev_write(fd, buf, nbyte)                            \
00275         __rt_dev_write(NULL, fd, buf, nbyte)
00276 
00277 #define rt_dev_recvmsg(fd, msg, flags)                          \
00278         __rt_dev_recvmsg(NULL, fd, msg, flags)
00279 
00280 #define rt_dev_sendmsg(fd, msg, flags)                          \
00281         __rt_dev_sendmsg(NULL, fd, msg, flags)
00282 
00283 static inline ssize_t rt_dev_recvfrom(int fd, void *buf, size_t len, int flags,
00284                                       struct sockaddr *from,
00285                                       socklen_t *fromlen)
00286 {
00287         struct iovec iov;
00288         struct msghdr msg;
00289         int ret;
00290 
00291         iov.iov_base = buf;
00292         iov.iov_len = len;
00293 
00294         msg.msg_name = from;
00295         msg.msg_namelen = from ? *fromlen : 0;
00296         msg.msg_iov = &iov;
00297         msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
00298         msg.msg_control = NULL;
00299         msg.msg_controllen = 0;
00300 
00301         ret = rt_dev_recvmsg(fd, &msg, flags);
00302         if (ret >= 0 && from)
00303                 *fromlen = msg.msg_namelen;
00304         return ret;
00305 }
00306 
00307 #else /* !__KERNEL__ */

00335 static inline ssize_t rt_dev_recv(int fd, void *buf, size_t len, int flags)
00336 {
00337         return rt_dev_recvfrom(fd, buf, len, flags, NULL, NULL);
00338 }
00339 
00340 static inline ssize_t rt_dev_sendto(int fd, const void *buf, size_t len,
00341                                     int flags, const struct sockaddr *to,
00342                                     socklen_t tolen)
00343 {
00344         struct iovec iov;
00345         struct msghdr msg;
00346 
00347         iov.iov_base = (void *)buf;
00348         iov.iov_len = len;
00349 
00350         msg.msg_name = (struct sockaddr *)to;
00351         msg.msg_namelen = tolen;
00352         msg.msg_iov = &iov;
00353         msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
00354         msg.msg_control = NULL;
00355         msg.msg_controllen = 0;
00356 
00357         return rt_dev_sendmsg(fd, &msg, flags);
00358 }
00359 
00360 static inline ssize_t rt_dev_send(int fd, const void *buf, size_t len,
00361                                   int flags)
00362 {
00363         return rt_dev_sendto(fd, buf, len, flags, NULL, 0);
00364 }
00365 
00366 static inline int rt_dev_getsockopt(int fd, int level, int optname,
00367                                     void *optval, socklen_t *optlen)
00368 {
00369         struct _rtdm_getsockopt_args args =
00370                 { level, optname, optval, optlen };
00371 
00372         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_GETSOCKOPT, &args);
00373 }
00374 
00375 static inline int rt_dev_setsockopt(int fd, int level, int optname,
00376                                     const void *optval, socklen_t optlen)
00377 {
00378         struct _rtdm_setsockopt_args args =
00379                 { level, optname, (void *)optval, optlen };
00380 
00381         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_SETSOCKOPT, &args);
00382 }
00383 
00384 static inline int rt_dev_bind(int fd, const struct sockaddr *my_addr,
00385                               socklen_t addrlen)
00386 {
00387         struct _rtdm_setsockaddr_args args = { my_addr, addrlen };
00388 
00389         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_BIND, &args);
00390 }
00391 
00392 static inline int rt_dev_connect(int fd, const struct sockaddr *serv_addr,
00393                                  socklen_t addrlen)
00394 {
00395         struct _rtdm_setsockaddr_args args = { serv_addr, addrlen };
00396 
00397         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_CONNECT, &args);
00398 }
00399 
00400 static inline int rt_dev_listen(int fd, int backlog)
00401 {
00402         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_LISTEN, backlog);
00403 }
00404 
00405 static inline int rt_dev_accept(int fd, struct sockaddr *addr,
00406                                 socklen_t *addrlen)
00407 {
00408         struct _rtdm_getsockaddr_args args = { addr, addrlen };
00409 
00410         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_ACCEPT, &args);
00411 }
00412 
00413 static inline int rt_dev_getsockname(int fd, struct sockaddr *name,
00414                                      socklen_t *namelen)
00415 {
00416         struct _rtdm_getsockaddr_args args = { name, namelen };
00417 
00418         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_GETSOCKNAME, &args);

00421 static inline int rt_dev_getpeername(int fd, struct sockaddr *name,
00422                                      socklen_t *namelen)

00424         struct _rtdm_getsockaddr_args args = { name, namelen };
00425 
00426         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_GETPEERNAME, &args);

00429 static inline int rt_dev_shutdown(int fd, int how)

00431         return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_SHUTDOWN, how);
